title: Can I get my money refund and why delete this?
body:
Yesterday finally I had money to buy RP. I recharged 200 dollers and try to buy the 6250 pack with worlds 2019 500 token.
After I bought 2 the shop told me one day only buy 2. Then today finished I can't buy anymore. Why you don't show me I can
only buy twice in one day before I bought. Why don't show the finished time in the shop and I can't find the finished time anywhere.
Now I had only 1950 token and I can't KAI'SA skin. I don't want anyothers. Can I get refund of my money ? If no, FK you riot, no more
money.

replies.body: No one response, good. See you in the court, riot

Ok, your post has only been up for 11 hours and OCE boards are small, so that seems like jumping the gun a bit.

At any rate, the best option for you is to submit a ticket to player support detailing your situation and as,king if there is anything they can do. They have no obligation to help you mind, as the information on end times was published well before the start of the event, but they may be able to work something out with you.

*Strong* warnings. Be polite. Go in with low expectations and understand that support has no obligation to help you. *Don't* mention legal action. So much as mention legal action in a ticket and they will not touch it. You will be referred to their legal team and support won't engage with you in the slightest.

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new
